101-156b mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na gdon thams cad kyi klad pa 'gas par 'gyur/ 'byung bo thams cad kyis gnod pa byas pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ rims nad la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /mar dang / yungs kar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro/ /sa bon bdug pa dang / mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na bdud la sogs pa'i gdug pas 'jigs skrag pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la sogs pa 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /sgron shing dang mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /ci 'dod pa de byed do/ /gang dang gang slangs pa de dang de 'thob po/ /ri khar sra tsi bog dang / yungs kar dang / mar las sbyin sreg byas na lha ma yin gyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur/ rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar dang / til mar dang / nA ga ge sar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /ci bsgo ba byed do/ /dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed do/ /phyin chad ser ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / / kha zas las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na 'bru stong du 'phel zhing mang por 'gyur ro/ /lan tshwa la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na gnod sbyin mo thams cad lhags nas/ rje btsun srog dang ma da bral cig dang / bka' ci stsal ba de bgyi'o zhes rkang pa la gtugs par 'gyur ro/ /'bras dang mar las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma la kha bltas te na le sham las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na de la lha thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo'i mdun du til dang / yungs kar las sbyin sreg byas na nor mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /shing ar ka'i yam sreg shing dang mar las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa

313
101-157a thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ dgra thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'di'i mthus bde ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur/ byad thams cad dang / bcings pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs te sbyin sreg gi las rnams kyis mchog tu zhi bar byed do/ /bde ba rab tu sbyin par byed/ nor thob par byed/ don grub par byed cing lta ba ngan par ltung ba'i sems can thams cad nyams par byed do/ /sbyin sreg grub pa rgyas pa'i le'u ste cho ga drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yin/ 'di ni yon tan khyad par chen po can yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs pa yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gang na yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pham par byed cing 'joms par byed pa yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dam pa yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen yin/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa 'jig pa yin/ 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad

314
101-157b kyi dmyal ba thams cad skems pa yin/ yi dgas kyi 'jig rten zlog pa yin/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar byed pa yin no/ /'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams skems par byed pa yin no/ /lag na rdo rje 'on kyang bsod nams kyi phung po 'byung ba lha'i mig gis blta ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyis kyang brjod kyis mi lang ste/ yon tan gyi khyad par de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar zab pa/ rab mchog gya nom pa la sogs pa de ltar gong nas gong du rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/ /nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di ni sems can skal ba chung ba rnams kyi lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ thos par mi 'gyur/ bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur/ 'chang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang gis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba de'i lag tu mchog tu gsang ba 'di 'ong ba'am/ nyan pa'am/ bsnyen bkur byed pa'am/ 'dzin par lta ga la 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gting dpag dka' ste/ lag na rdo rje gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma dang mnyam pa rnams la bskal pa brgya stong du bde ba'i yo byad na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims mal dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / zhal zas dang / btung ba dang / bcibs pa dang / pho brang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyi ma re re 'bul zhing / de bzhin du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa

315
101-158a byed pa dang / gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis byur bur bkang ste/ nyi ma re rer sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul ba ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po bskyed pa ma yin gyi/ lag na rdo rje gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di lan cig bzlas brjod byas na bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo / /gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig dran par gyur na/ de gong du bshad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par yongs su bsgrags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur/ mkho ba'i yo byad khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la de ltar nyin gcig bzhin mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis/ a la la zhes ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra cher bton nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma'o sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mtshungs par mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba gsang ba dam pa'i snying po 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag lags so/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen pos mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gshegs so/ /'phags pa nor bu chen po rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang shin tu rab tu gnas pa gsang ba dam pa'i gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ste bdun pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA gar+b+ha pra b+ha dang / lots+tsha ba ban+de dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen

316
101-158b gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//
